mapper.select: select ZD_ID as zdId,NAME as name,BIANMA as bianMa,ORDY_BY as ordyBy,PARENT_ID as parentId,JB as jb,P_BM as pBm from sys_dictionaries d where d.PARENT_ID = (SELECT ZD_ID FROM sys_dictionaries e WHERE e.BIANMA= #{pBm})

SELECT ZD_ID AS zdId, NAME AS NAME, BIANMA AS bianMa, ORDY_BY AS ordyBy, PARENT_ID AS parentId, JB AS jb, P_BM AS pBm FROM sys_dictionaries d WHERE d.PARENT_ID IN (SELECT ZD_ID FROM sys_dictionaries d WHERE d.PARENT_ID = (SELECT ZD_ID FROM sys_dictionaries e WHERE e.BIANMA = #{pBm})) and d.jb=#{jb}
